titleStmt.title: Proposals for the printing a description of the cities of London and Westminster, with the liberties and parts adjacent, according to their present state. And for as much as our American plantations are of such great concern in way of trade, &c. to this city and kingdom, there shall be printed a description thereof and that according to these particulars, / by Richard Blome, his Majesty's cosmographical printer, dwelling in New Weldstreet, at the Green Pallisado Pails, near Clare-market ; where proposals are delivered, and subscriptions taken for the same, and where the work may be inspected every Tuesday and Thursday in the afternoons.
titleStmt.author: Blome, Richard, d. 1705.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).

With: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III). ...Whereas Richard Blome ... hath represented unto us that he hath undertaken the printing a new survey ... of ... London and Westminster ...
